kernfrasen: begin their magical journey through the enchanted forest
led and protected by a luminous star
human race is utterly incapable of turning itself around under its own steam
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY THROUGH AN ENCHANTED FOREST

kernfrasen: God is breaking into this world order with power from another sphere
something wonderful has broken through to us from beyond ourselves
sin will be vanquished by righteousness

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The human race is utterly incapable of turning itself around under its own steam.

doeldomein.theologisch_concept: Total Depravity / Inability to Save Oneself

cognitieve_implicaties: Humans are stuck on a fixed track leading to destruction.
theologische_implicaties: Salvation must be an external intervention (monergism).
ethische_implicaties: Humility; cessation of self-improvement efforts as a means of grace.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Potential fatalism or denial of human responsibility.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates a dead idiom ('under own steam') by applying it to the cosmic scale of the 'human race'.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Magic/Fairy Tale' domain as a bridge to the 'Kingdom' domain, contrasting the 'illusion of magic' with the 'reality of the Kingdom'.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher moves from a 'precious jewels' aesthetic to a 'frightening' divine encounter.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Magic implies comfort/escapism; Angels imply terror/judgment.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Narrative sequencing: Defeat of enemy leads to the journey which ends in the Kingdom.

sterktes.beschrijving: Revitalizes the 'Kingdom' metaphor by using the cultural schema of The Nutcracker to evoke the deep human longing for an 'enchanted realm'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: a kingdom of radiant delight where men treat women like precious jewels

risicos.beschrijving: By using 'Magic' as the primary source domain, there is a risk that the congregation views the Gospel as a sophisticated myth rather than historical reality.
risicos.voorbeeld: Christmas Eve! How magical it is!
risicos.potentiele_impact: Faith becomes an emotional 'feeling' triggered by aesthetics rather than a commitment to truth.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The 'Enchanted Forest' of The Nutcracker, representing the human longing for peace.
sub_worlds: The 'Suburban Surface' of Rye (blazers, fur coats, eggnog)

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Emphasizing that the angel and the baby are 'from another sphere' and 'not us'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strong; utilizes the sensory elements of the 'midnight service' (candles, organ) to ground the abstract metaphors.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is built on a sophisticated tension between the 'Magic' of the season and the 'Reality' of the Incarnation. It successfully uses the JOURNEY and KINGDOM domains to address a sophisticated, perhaps jaded, suburban audience. The dominant cognitive move is the 'Inbreaking' (CONTAINER/SPHERE) which protects the transcendence of God.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain of 'Terror' and 'Otherness'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The angel is a tear in the fabric of our reality.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly define the 'Kingdom' not as 'Magic' (illusion) but as 'The Real' (the source of all beauty).

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Emmanu-el' (God with us) relational domain already present in the text.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To bridge the 'naked and bandaged' boy in the Times with the healing power of the Kingdom.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using cultural schemas (The Nutcracker) to deconstruct secular sentimentality and reconstruct orthodox Christology.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the Nutcracker imagery for its beauty, CMT reveals how it functions as a cognitive map for the 'Kingdom of God'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning cycles, CMT focuses on the underlying conceptual structures that make the experience of the sermon possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies the 'Inbreaking' metaphor as the crucial cognitive mechanism that prevents the sermon from collapsing into mere therapeutic deism.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: magical journey through the enchanted forest
turning itself around under its own steam
broken through to us from beyond
appendices.notities: The preacher's return after 17 years adds a 'Time as Journey' layer that enhances the authority of the 'tested in the flame' metaphor.
